channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-12205] Backport HBASE-12016 'Reduce number of versions in Meta table. Make it configurable' to 0.98
item.description: Adapt the changes made in HBASE-12016 'Reduce number of versions in Meta table. Make it configurable' to 0.98. Not a backport as much as a functionally equivalent set of changes.
item.summary: Backport HBASE-12016 'Reduce number of versions in Meta table. Make it configurable' to 0.98

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Attached is an equivalent set of changes for 0.98 with the exception that the default number of versions in META is kept at 10. (The trunk patch changed that from 10 to 3.)

Setting Patch Available, note that Jenkins will fail to apply this patch as it is for 0.98. All 0.98 branch unit tests pass locally.
Hey Ted Yu you were asking for a 0.98 patch on HBASE-12016, one is ready here for review.

FAILURE: Integrated in HBase-0.98-on-Hadoop-1.1 #605 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-0.98-on-Hadoop-1.1/605/)
